creator: vincent.hardy@sun.com
text:
a. Start the browser: build svgbrowser
b. Type the following string in the brower's Location field:
      samples\anne.svg
   The browser successfully loads the file and changes the location
   field to:
     file:C:/work/Doc/svg/apache/xml-batik/samples/anne.svg
c. Using the menu File->Open File, load samples/batik3D.svg.
   The browser successfully loads the file and changes the location
   field to:
     file:/C:/work/Doc/svg/apache/xml-batik/samples/batik3D.svg
d. Type the following string in the browser's Location field:
      samples\batikFX.svg
   The following error message occurs:
    Error
     
C:\work\Doc\svg\apache\xml-batik\samples\C:\work\Doc\svg\apache\xml-batik\sampl
es\batikFX.svg
(The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect).

It seems that the parent directory is pre-pended to the file name one
too many times.
